cformat

Provide printf-like formatting similar to the C standard library.

Functions
sprintf
FUNCTION sprintf(
fmt
: 
String,
value
: 
Object...
): String

Given a format string and an array of parameters, format the string and return the result.

Parameters
fmt
String

the format string

value

the values to format

Description

The available formatting codes are

%d

decimal number

%s

string

Exceptions
- <TypeMismatch>

if the wrong type is supplied for a parameter

See Also

printf

printf
FUNCTION printf(
fmt
: 
String,
value
: 
Object...
)

Given a format string and an array of parameters, format the string and print the result.

Parameters
fmt
String

the format string

value

the values to format

Exceptions
- <TypeMismatch>

if the wrong type is supplied for a parameter

See Also

sprintf
